<Extension()> Public Function AddFaceFromStreamAsync (operations As IPersonGroupPerson, personGroupId As String, personId As Guid, image As Stream, Optional userData As String = null, Optional targetFace As IList(Of Integer) = null, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = null) As Task(Of PersistedFace)

static member AddFaceFromStreamAsync : Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.IPersonGroupPerson * string * Guid * System.IO.Stream * string * System.Collections.Generic.IList<int> * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.Models.PersistedFace>
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.PersonGroupPersonExtensions.AddFaceFromStreamAsync (operations, personGroupId, personId, image, userData, targetFace, cancellationToken)

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Id referencing a particular person group.
Id referencing a particular person.
An image stream.
User-specified data about the face for any purpose. The maximum length is 1KB.

A face rectangle to specify the target face to be added to a person in the format of "targetFace=left,top,width,height". E.g. "targetFace=10,10,100,100". If there is more than one face in the image, targetFace is required to specify which face to add. No targetFace means there is only one face detected in the entire image.
The cancellation token.
Docs.summary: Add a representative face to a person for identification. The input face is specified as an image with a targetFace rectangle.
